page.title: 08MARKET IN THE BEECHES
page.content: The Burnham Beeches market has taken the place of the old fair that used to be there.This market was moved in 1984, from Colnbrook,Bucks;to the Beeches.It is on Saturdays and begins early, lasting all day.There is a regular free Bus service every half hour from Slough Bus station.The market takes place on a large flat gravel area with adequate parking on one side.The market is set up like a maze so you have to weave in and out the stalls.Most stalls are covered.The market is especially good for computer games,watch's,electronics and for clothes.There is a "toddlers fair"which has a roundabout,dodgems and double swings.The market is projected to stay in the Beeches until 1986.It is situated next to the old swimming pool which was burnt down by vandals in 1983.
